title: Sold: 1909-11 T206 White Border Piedmont 150 Bobby Wallace, Portrait - PSA EX-MT 6
author: Epps

posts.post_title: Sold: 1909-11 T206 White Border Piedmont 150 Bobby Wallace, Portrait - PSA EX-MT 6
posts.post_content:
For sale is a beautiful T206 of HOF Bobby Wallace. Graded PSA 6 and having a Piedmont 150 back, this card really pops. The colors and registration are spectacular, and Wallace has some great centering. $625 delivered and insured. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers. 

$Sold delivered and insured


[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=218148&d=1453051840[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=218149&d=1453051850[/IMG]
I know one of your Spouses wants a PSA 6 Wallace for Christmas. This is the one

Epps,

When you get drafted in June people will be buying from you left and right.

Fingers crossed its the Metropolitans :)

Derek
